about_the_game: This unhelpful guide gives you a sneak peek at the brief history of the KotCT-verse. Laura Carminrot, granddaughter of the infamous Regina Carminrot, seemed to have poked a beehive the troubles with which began long before she was born. There's also a small teaser to her own future fate and the adventures of those influenced by her exploits.
detailed_description: This unhelpful guide gives you a sneak peek at the brief history of the KotCT-verse. Laura Carminrot, granddaughter of the infamous Regina Carminrot, seemed to have poked a beehive the troubles with which began long before she was born. There's also a small teaser to her own future fate and the adventures of those influenced by her exploits.
